framework.name: EU Taxonomy Regulation
framework.description: Classification system establishing a list of environmentally sustainable economic activities
framework.applicability: Large public-interest entities and financial market participants in the EU

objectives.name: Climate Change Mitigation
objectives.description: Substantial contribution to stabilizing greenhouse gas concentrations in the atmosphere

objectives.name: Climate Change Adaptation
objectives.description: Substantial contribution to reducing or preventing the adverse impact of climate change

objectives.name: Sustainable Use and Protection of Water and Marine Resources
objectives.description: Substantial contribution to achieving good environmental status of marine waters

objectives.name: Transition to a Circular Economy
objectives.description: Substantial contribution to waste prevention, reuse and recycling

objectives.name: Pollution Prevention and Control
objectives.description: Substantial contribution to environmental protection from pollution

objectives.name: Protection and Restoration of Biodiversity and Ecosystems
objectives.description: Substantial contribution to protecting, conserving or restoring biodiversity

activities.name: Electricity generation using solar photovoltaic technology
activities.description: Construction or operation of electricity generation facilities that produce electricity using solar photovoltaic technology
activities.alignment_criteria: Technical screening criteria must be met

activities.name: Electricity generation using concentrated solar power technology
activities.description: Construction or operation of electricity generation facilities that produce electricity using concentrated solar power technology
activities.alignment_criteria: Technical screening criteria must be met

activities.name: Electricity generation from wind power
activities.description: Construction or operation of electricity generation facilities that produce electricity from wind power
activities.alignment_criteria: Technical screening criteria must be met

activities.name: Electricity generation from hydropower
activities.description: Construction or operation of run-of-river hydropower plants and other hydropower plants
activities.eligibility: Conditional - depends on power density and GHG emissions
activities.alignment_criteria: Power density > 5 W/m2 or GHG emissions < 100 g CO2e/kWh

activities.name: Electricity generation from bioenergy
activities.description: Construction or operation of electricity generation facilities that produce electricity from bioenergy
activities.eligibility: Conditional - depends on feedstock and emissions criteria
activities.alignment_criteria: Specific feedstock requirements and GHG emission thresholds

activities.name: Manufacture of renewable energy technologies
activities.alignment_criteria: Manufacturing equipment for renewable energy generation

activities.name: Manufacture of equipment for the production and use of hydrogen
activities.description: Manufacture of equipment for the production, storage, transport and use of hydrogen
activities.alignment_criteria: Equipment enables hydrogen value chain activities

activities.name: Manufacture of low carbon technologies for transport
activities.description: Manufacture of low carbon technologies for transport
activities.alignment_criteria: Zero direct (tailpipe) CO2 emissions or specific emission thresholds

activities.name: Manufacture of other low carbon technologies
activities.description: Manufacture of technologies aimed at substantial GHG emission reductions
activities.alignment_criteria: Substantial life-cycle GHG emission reductions compared to alternatives

activities.name: Passenger interurban rail transport
activities.description: Purchase, financing, leasing, rental and operation of passenger interurban rail transport

activities.name: Freight rail transport
activities.description: Purchase, financing, leasing, rental and operation of freight rail transport

activities.name: Transport by motorbikes, passenger cars and light commercial vehicles
activities.description: Purchase, financing, leasing, rental and operation of vehicles
activities.alignment_criteria: Zero direct (tailpipe) CO2 emissions until 2025; <50g CO2/km thereafter

activities.name: Infrastructure enabling low-carbon transport
activities.description: Construction, modernisation, maintenance and operation of infrastructure
activities.alignment_criteria: Dedicated to operation of vehicles meeting taxonomy criteria

activities.name: Construction of new buildings
activities.description: Development of building projects and construction of new buildings
activities.alignment_criteria: Primary Energy Demand at least 10% lower than NZEB threshold

activities.name: Renovation of existing buildings
activities.description: Individual renovation measures and full building renovation
activities.alignment_criteria: At least 30% reduction in primary energy demand or significant improvement

activities.name: Acquisition and ownership of buildings
activities.description: Buying real estate and exercising ownership of that real estate
activities.eligibility: Conditional - depends on building energy performance
activities.alignment_criteria: Buildings constructed before 31/12/2020 with EPC class A or top 15% performance

activities.name: Afforestation
activities.description: Establishing forest on land that was not previously forested
activities.alignment_criteria: Climate-resilient species, no conversion of high carbon stock areas

activities.name: Restoration of existing forests
activities.description: Forest restoration activities including restocking and supplementary planting
activities.alignment_criteria: Increase carbon stock, biodiversity and ecosystem resilience

activities.name: Forest management
activities.description: Forest management activities in existing forests
activities.alignment_criteria: Net carbon sequestration, sustainable management practices

substantial_contribution.description: Activity must make a substantial contribution to at least one environmental objective
substantial_contribution.assessment: Quantitative thresholds and qualitative criteria defined per activity

do_no_significant_harm.description: Activity must not significantly harm any of the other environmental objectives
do_no_significant_harm.assessment: DNSH criteria defined for each objective not substantially contributed to

minimum_safeguards.description: Activity must comply with minimum social safeguards
requirements: UN Guiding Principles on Business and Human Rights
ILO Declaration on Fundamental Principles and Rights at Work

metrics.name: Proportion of taxonomy-eligible activities
metrics.description: % of turnover, CapEx, OpEx from taxonomy-eligible activities

metrics.name: Proportion of taxonomy-aligned activities
metrics.description: % of turnover, CapEx, OpEx from taxonomy-aligned activities

non_financial_undertakings.templates: Mandatory disclosure templates in Annex II

financial_undertakings.applicability: Credit institutions, investment firms, insurance and reinsurance undertakings, pension funds, AIFMs, UCITS management companies

metrics.name: Green Asset Ratio (GAR)
metrics.description: Proportion of covered assets financing taxonomy-aligned activities

metrics.name: Banking Book Taxonomy Alignment Ratio
metrics.description: Proportion of banking book exposures to taxonomy-aligned activities

validation.eligibility_check: Activity must be listed in taxonomy delegated acts
validation.technical_criteria_assessment: All technical screening criteria must be met
validation.safeguards_compliance: Minimum social safeguards must be complied with

scoring.methodology: Binary alignment assessment with proportion calculation
scoring.alignment_determination: All criteria must pass for taxonomy alignment
scoring.aggregation: Weighted by turnover, CapEx, and OpEx

regulatoryMandates.applicability: Large public-interest entities and financial market participants
Replacing NFRD with broader scope from 2024

reporting.recommendedFormat: Standalone section in management report or non-financial statement
reporting.auditRequirements: Statutory auditor must check consistency and completeness

timeline.2022: Non-financial undertakings report on climate objectives (mitigation and adaptation)
timeline.2023: Non-financial undertakings report on all six environmental objectives
timeline.2024: Financial undertakings start reporting under taxonomy regulation
timeline.2026: Extended scope under CSRD includes medium and small listed companies
